DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test - workplace set - online multi-session alcohol intervention improve treatment effect single session screen feedback . Hypothesis : automated online multi-session follow-up improves effect alcohol consumption single session screening
DOC.brief_title: Testing Efficacy Online Alcohol Intervention Workplace Setting
DOC.detailed_description: Setting : Online study among Norwegian employee . Participants : At-risk drinker among employee select group norwegian workplace recruit e-mail job e-mail account , advertisement intranet organization . Design : Randomized control trial ( RCT ) . Subjects condition receive single session screen procedure include individualized normative feedback . The control group receive online booklet effect alcohol . The treatment group receive multi session follow program `` Balance '' .
DOC.criteria: hazardous harmful drinking ( i.e. , FASTscore 3 ) underage ( < 18 ) provide valid email address provide valid ( Norwegian ) mobile phone number
